headline: UPS Stock Approaches Its Covid-Era Lows. Is it a Buy?
summary: Since the second half of 2022, UPS has shown a pattern of brief, deceptive rallies following steep declines.

raw.headline: UPS Stock Approaches Its Covid-Era Lows. Is it a Buy?

headline: Next-Gen AI Marketing Tools Propel Zeta Global’s Ambitious 2028 Goals
summary: Zeta Global Holdings Corp. (NYSE:ZETA) is one of the 10 Stocks with Huge Catalysts on the Horizon. The company unveils next-gen AI marketing tools, sets bold 2028 financial targets ahead of Q2 earnings. Headquartered in New York City, Zeta Global Holdings Corp. (NYSE:ZETA) is a marketing technology company offering AI-powered multichannel marketing solutions. The company’s […]

headline: FedEx Canada Tries to Strip Union Rights from Immigrant Workers, say Teamsters
summary: Teamsters slam move as racist and morally indefensibleCALGARY, Alberta, July 31, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- FedEx Canada is attempting to deny basic union rights to immigrant workers. In response to a union organizing drive by Teamsters Local Union 362 at the FedEx facility in Fort McMurray, the company has filed arguments before the Canada Industrial Relations Board claiming that “temporary workers,” like international students and temporary foreign workers, are not entitled to join a union along

headline: J.P. Morgan Payments Launches Cutting-Edge Supply Chain Finance Solution with Oracle
summary: NEW YORK, July 31, 2025--J.P. Morgan Payments is unveiling its Supply Chain Finance (SCF) solution integrated with Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) to optimize working capital — a solution that is being used by FedEx.

raw.headline: J.P. Morgan Payments Launches Cutting-Edge Supply Chain Finance Solution with Oracle

headline: Local High School Alumni Take On New Ownership of Pak Mail in Birmingham, Alabama from Their Former Employer
summary: Annex Brands, Inc., a leading franchisor in the packing, shipping, and office services industries, is pleased to announce the successful transfer of ownership of an existing Pak Mail location in Birmingham, AL to former employees, turned new owners, Caleb Gore and Chandler Pruitt. This transition to new ownership ensures that the community will benefit from the essential shipping and office services provided by the Pak Mail location's previous owner, Bill Walther, with the fresh perspective Cale
